messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Trouble Installing WOW Expansion Pack?
messages.msgSnippet: I had a horrible install.  But mine had to do with Vista not  the actual game itself.  Once i got XP back on my computer it was  fine In a message dated
messages.messageBody:
I had a horrible install. But mine had to do with Vista not the actual game
itself. Once i got XP back on my computer it was fine

In a message dated 1/16/2007 1:52:25 P.M. Central Standard Time,
jlh44music@... writes:




Danielle is now totally frustrated, the installation is stuck on the
3rd disc, she's tried several times and it just stops and says it's not
responding. My dh is the computer person but is unavailable at
work. It's probably something that he'll have to be here for, so
we'll just have to wait, but I thought I'd ask. Her friends on WOW all
so far said the install was pretty easy. I hope we don't have a bad
disc (arrrggghhh!di







~Alyssa in IL
_http://squishymommy.blogspot.com_ (http://squishymommy.blogspot.com/)

messages.subject: Re: Trouble Installing WOW Expansion Pack?
messages.msgSnippet: ... 3rd disc, she s tried several times and it just stops and says it s not responding. Crisis averted!  She was hitting OK after she put each disc in, so
messages.messageBody:
"jlh44music" <jlh44music@...> wrote:
>
> Danielle is now totally frustrated, the installation is stuck on the
3rd disc, she's tried several times and it just stops and says it's not
responding.>

Crisis averted! She was hitting "OK" after she put each disc in, so
she started over and just let it go on by itself! Some of her friends
on her guild helped her out! Thought you'd like to know in case
someone else was having the same problem!
Jann

messages.subject: Trouble Installing WOW Expansion Pack?
messages.msgSnippet: Danielle is now totally frustrated, the installation is stuck on the 3rd disc, she s tried several times and it just stops and says it s not responding.   My
messages.messageBody:
Danielle is now totally frustrated, the installation is stuck on the
3rd disc, she's tried several times and it just stops and says it's not
responding. My dh is the computer person but is unavailable at
work. It's probably something that he'll have to be here for, so
we'll just have to wait, but I thought I'd ask. Her friends on WOW all
so far said the install was pretty easy. I hope we don't have a bad
disc (arrrggghhh!).
Thanks
Jann
